name: ILS Servo Motor
description: Control standard 180° and continuous 360° servo motors. Perfect for robot arms, doors, wheels and more!
author: ILS

hardware.name: Servo Motor

continuous.name: 360° Continuous Servo
continuous.description: Modified servo for continuous rotation like a motor

pins.Signal: Control signal (PWM) - connect to ESP32 GPIO

connections: Connect signal wire (orange/yellow/white) to ESP32 GPIO pin
Use external 5V power for multiple servos (not ESP32 5V pin)
Connect ESP32 GND to external power GND
power_notes: Single servo: Can use ESP32 5V pin (be careful)
Multiple servos: Use external 5V power supply (recommended)
Always connect grounds together (ESP32 GND + Power Supply GND)

tips: Standard servo: Angle 90° is center position
Standard servo: Angle 0° is full left, 180° is full right
Continuous servo: Speed 0 stops, 50 is slow, 100 is fast
Use detach() when not moving to save power
Smooth move creates gradual motion for realistic movements
Sweep is great for back-and-forth motions like waving
